Activity: Arrive at the office, grab coffee. Check emails and respond to feedback about environment concepts.
Shift focus to prop designs. Review any documentation or guidelines from @ldes-1 and @lvdn-1 regarding the types of props needed for the game.
Brainstorm a list of props that will be essential for the game's environment and gameplay. Think about both functional and decorative props.
Start sketching prop designs. Focus on creating props that are visually interesting and fit the game's overall style.
Choose three props to develop further. Refine the designs and add details. Think about how the props will be used in the game.
Lunch Break. Chat with @tart-1 about any technical constraints I should be aware of when designing props.
Continue developing the prop designs. Create orthographic views of the props to help the 3D modelers understand the dimensions and details.
Research different materials and textures that could be used for the props. Find reference images to help visualize the final look.
Email @3dmod-1, @tart-1 and @ldes-1 to show my Prop concept. TOPIC: Prop Concept Initial Sketches - Feedback Request.
While waiting for feedback, work on adding color variations to one of the prop designs.
Wrap up for the day. Save all files and back up my work. Plan for tomorrow: refine prop designs and begin color palettes.
